Data: 12.30 pm Australia have won the toss and they will field. There are no changes in their squad. Sri Lanka would have batted first anyway, says Angelo Mathews. They are also going in with an unchanged squad.
Johnson to Perera, FOUR runs gets a gift first ball. It was short and wide and rising, and KJP slaps it over point with some ferocity

Johnson to Perera, 4 leg byes now he slips a fuller length delivery down the leg side and all KJP has to do is to get some bat on it. He doesn't get any bat, but gets some pad on that and the ball runs down fine

Johnson to Perera, OUT another length ball on the leg stump, it hits the batsman as he is shuffling to play it towards the leg side, he gets hit in front of the leg stump, under the knee roll. The umpire takes some time and then raises his finger. KJP walks up to Dilshan to ask how that looked, but after a lengthy discussion, he is on his way.
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run short delivery outside off, the batsman gets up on his toes and taps it straight to point
Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run short of length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman goes on the back foot and tucks it to fine leg for a single
Johnson to Dilshan, no run length delivery on the pads, he fails to get bat on that. It hits the pads and rolls towards square leg
McKay to Sangakkara, 1 wide he bowls a length delivery that swings down the leg side, called a wide
McKay to Sangakkara, no run pushes it fuller and on the middle stump line, Sanga gets solidly behind that and defends it back to the bowler
McKay to Sangakkara, no run he beats the bat with a length delivery that goes away with the angle. Sanga plays inside the line
McKay to Sangakkara, no run he leaves this one alone, in a strange manner though. Goes forward to play at it, but then takes the bat away from the line of the ball
McKay to Sangakkara, 1 run length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman tucks it to fine leg for a single
McKay to Dilshan, FOUR runs he tests Dilshan with a full and wide delivery but the batsman is an expert in dealing with these, drives it hard through cover point for a four

McKay to Dilshan, 3 runs and through that same gap again, this time off a short of length delivery just outside off. The batsman went to the back foot and punched it in the gap. The fielder from third man runs around to cut off the boundary
Johnson to Dilshan, 1 run back of length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman drops it in front towards off side and calls for a quick single
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run short of length delivery just outside off, the batsman drops his wrists and lets this one go through
Johnson to Sangakkara, no run length delivery outside off, swinging a touch away. Sanga waits in the crease and opens the face to run it to point

Johnson to Sangakkara, 1 run oh that could have been close at the non-striker's end! Would have been out! Sanga drove it to the left of mid-on and set off immediately, but he would have been short by some distance had Doherty hit the stumps
Johnson to Dilshan, no run length delivery going across the right-hander, left alone by Dilshan
Johnson to Dilshan, no run goes fuller around off and middle line, but doesn't get that inswing. Dilshan drives it to straight to midwicket
McKay to Sangakkara, no run he keeps leaving these angled deliveries by bringing his bat down, then taking it away from the line of the ball. Looks like he is getting beaten, but he is not

McKay to Sangakkara, OUT big big wicket this is! Sanga has driven a full and wide delivery straight into the hands of point. It's his bread and butter shot, and he would have backed himself to clear that fielder, but he didn't get much elevation as the fielder takes it just over his head
McKay to Thirimanne, no run he gets a yorker first up, but he does well to bring his bat down in time
McKay to Thirimanne, no run length delivery on off stump, the batsman gets right behind it and defends it down the pitch
McKay to Thirimanne, no run it's full and it's just wide outside off, going away with the angle, Thirimanne covers the line of the stumps and lets this one go through
McKay to Thirimanne, no run back of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
Johnson to Dilshan, no run fuller length delivery on off stump, 145 kph, Dilshan takes a forward stride and defends it back to the bowler
Johnson to Dilshan, no run length delivery just outside off, the batsman comes forward again and pushes inside the line. the ball goes through to the keeper
Johnson to Dilshan, no run wider this time, keeps it full again and Dilshan has had enough of defending, he goes for an on the up drive and is beaten
Johnson to Dilshan, 1 run back of length delivery on the leg stump line, the batsman whips it off his hips to fine leg for a single

Johnson to Thirimanne, 4 byes short of length outside off, 146 kph, nasty delivery actually as it quickly rose on to the batsman, and it kept rising after Thiri got out of the way and went over the keeper's head
Johnson to Thirimanne, 1 run fuller delivery on the pads, clipped fine on the leg side for a single
McKay to Thirimanne, no run he bowls a full delivery on the pads, the batsman comes forward and punches it back to the bowler
McKay to Thirimanne, no run fuller delivery angled across the batsman, Thirimanne comes forward then lets it go through
McKay to Thirimanne, no run he takes a forward step and drives the fuller delivery, but straight to the man at cover
McKay to Thirimanne, 2 runs back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman waits and tucks it to deep backward square leg for a couple
McKay to Thirimanne, no run fuller length delivery on the middle stump line, the batsman tries to work it away to the leg side, but gets an inside edge on to his pads
McKay to Thirimanne, no run he bowls it full and outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to mid-off
Johnson to Dilshan, no run back of length delivery on the off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends it back to the bowler
Johnson to Dilshan, 1 run he comes forward to drive seeing the fuller length, but it was a slower one - 132 kph - and Dilshan gets a thick outside edge to third man for a single
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run he bowls a back of length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends off the back foot

Johnson to Thirimanne, no run he goes slightly wide of the crease and bowls a fuller delivery just wide outside off, 145 kph, Thiri comes forward to play a forceful drive but plays inside the line. Excellent delivery
Johnson to Thirimanne, 1 run length delivery just outside off, 144.6 kph, this time the batsman just pushes it past backward point down to third man for a single
Johnson to Dilshan, no run he goes very full just outside off, Dilshan tries to drive it, but manages to just block it out to cover
McKay to Thirimanne, 1 run he bowls a length delivery, but this one is on the pads, easily flicked away to fine leg for a single
McKay to Dilshan, 3 runs this time it's on Dilshan's pads and he easily flicks it past square leg for a couple of runs
McKay to Thirimanne, no run length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and defends it to off
McKay to Thirimanne, no run more solid front foot defence from the batsman, he plays the length delivery towards cover
McKay to Thirimanne, no run he goes for yorker just outside off, but it's a half-volley and is driven hard straight to mid-off
McKay to Thirimanne, no run bowls a teasing line just outside off, the batsman comes forward and then lets it go through
Faulkner to Dilshan, no run he bowls back of length on off stump, the batsman defends it off the back foot
Faulkner to Dilshan, no run short of length delivery on off stump and Dilshan tries to pull it over midwicket, but gets an inside edge on to his body
Faulkner to Dilshan, 1 run length delivery on the pads, the batsman works it to deep square leg for a single

Faulkner to Thirimanne, 1 run back of length delivery, the batsman dabs it to the left of square leg and calls for a quick single. Dilshan dives in to make his ground, but the fielder missed the stumps
Faulkner to Dilshan, no run length delivery just outside off, Dilshan comes forward and punches it to mid off
Faulkner to Dilshan, no run length delivery just outside off, moves a touch away after pitching and Dilshan was beaten as he played inside the line
Watson to Thirimanne, no run he bowls a short of length delivery just outside off and immediately the batsman goes on the back foot to play a punch, but he plays it straight to point
Watson to Thirimanne, no run he stays on the back foot and defends the length delivery towards off side
Watson to Thirimanne, 1 run nice cracked off the back foot but straight to third man. There wasn't much room to play the cut shot there
Watson to Dilshan, no run he goes on the back foot to this length delivery and punches it straight to the cover fielder
Watson to Dilshan, 2 runs length delivery on the middle stump line, Dilshan goes on the back foot and punches it through the gap at midwicket for a couple of runs
Watson to Dilshan, 1 run he pushes this one softly to midwicket again for an easy single
Faulkner to Dilshan, no run length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
Faulkner to Dilshan, no run back of length delivery on off, bounces a touch extra, Dilshan goes on the back foot and defends it to point
Faulkner to Dilshan, 1 run slightly short on off stump, and at that pace, the batsman slaps it easily to deep midwicket
Faulkner to Thirimanne, FOUR runs beautifully hit through midwicket! He shuffled across and whipped the length delivery through the gap just like Sanga would have..
Faulkner to Thirimanne, FOUR runs he draws an outside edge this time with a length delivery outside off, but there is no slip in place and this one runs down to the boundary too
Faulkner to Thirimanne, no run length delivery at a slower pace outside off, the batsman defends it towards off
Watson to Dilshan, no run back of length delivery honing in on off stump, the batsman punches it to cover off the back foot
Watson to Dilshan, 1 run back of length delivery on the pads, the batsman easily whips to fine leg to bring up Sri Lanka's fifty
Watson to Thirimanne, 1 run back of length delivery on off, Thiri works it off the back foot towards midwicket for an easy single
Watson to Dilshan, no run fuller length delivery on off, the batsman belatedly comes forward and pushes it to mid on
Watson to Dilshan, 1 run length ball angling in on to the pads, the batsman clips it to fine leg for a single
Watson to Thirimanne, no run short delivery this time to test the batsman, but Thiri watches that early and ducks under it easily
Faulkner to Dilshan, no run back of length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends it to cover point
Faulkner to Dilshan, no run beautiful delivery! This was on a length, bowled with a scrambled seam and it just evades the outside edge as Dilshan comes forward to drive it

Faulkner to Dilshan, 1 run fuller this time, and Dilshan calls for a single as soon as he punches it towards mid-off. Voges dives across and stops the ball, but had he done it cleanly, it would have surely caused some confusion
Faulkner to Thirimanne, 1 run back of length delivery on the body, the batsman tucks it to fine leg for a single
Faulkner to Dilshan, 1 run length delivery on the middle, Dilshan comes forward and works it away to deep midwicket for a single
Faulkner to Thirimanne, no run length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to mid-off
Watson to Dilshan, 1 run length delivery on the middle stump line, Dilshan clips it to deep midwicket off the back foot and thinks about a second, but is rightly sent back
Watson to Thirimanne, no run back of length delivery outside off, the batsman gets up on his toes and defends it to cover
Watson to Thirimanne, no run he keeps it tight round about the off stump line, the batsman has no choice but to defend it back to the bowler
Watson to Thirimanne, no run length delivery just outside off, a touch slower though, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
Watson to Thirimanne, no run he comes on the front foot and drives the length ball stylishly to off, but straight to extra cover
Watson to Thirimanne, 2 runs short delivery, Thirimanne takes it on this time and pulls it all along the ground to deep backward square leg
Doherty to Dilshan, no run fires one in on the pads, the batsman drives it cover
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run slower this time, outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it hard to deep extra cover
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run comes from over the wicket and pushes it through outside off, there is some turn on offer too. The batsman gets hit on the pads, but outside the line of off
Doherty to Thirimanne, 2 runs tossed up and slower, the batsman comes forward and clips it fine on the leg side with the ball turning in
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run flighted delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to long on for an easy single
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run short and on off stump line, the batsman goes on the back foot and punches it hard to deep cover
Watson to Dilshan, 1 run back of length delivery on the pads, easily clipped away to fine leg for a single
Watson to Thirimanne, no run he comes forward and solidly defends the length delivery back to the bowler
Watson to Thirimanne, 1 run back of length delivery that doesn't bounce much, the batsman goes on the back foot and whips it to deep square leg for a single
Watson to Dilshan, 1 run length delivery that comes in after hitting the deck, the batsman was shaping for a backfoot punch through cover, but adjust well to chop it towards backward point
Watson to Thirimanne, 1 run full and wide outside off, the batsman drives it to cover and takes off for a single. Faulkner fires a throw in, but Thiri makes it well in time
Watson to Dilshan, no run another length ball comes in after pitching, the batsman defends it towards the leg side this time
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run he pushes it full and wide outside off and it goes past the outside edge as the batsman pushes inside the line, muted appeal by the keeper
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run flatter delivery, turns in after pitching, the batsman works it away to backward square leg
Doherty to Dilshan, no run tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and drives it straight to cover
Doherty to Dilshan, 2 runs slower and flighted, drifts in from round the wicket, the batsman gets an outside edge through point as he tries to drive it
Doherty to Dilshan, no run tossed up and on the pads, the batsman comes forward and tries to work it away to leg side, gets hit on the pads though
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run quicker and shorter outside off, the batsman waits on the back foot and punches it through point
Marsh to Dilshan, no run starts off with a short of length delivery outside off, the batsman whacks it off the back foot, but straight to point
Marsh to Dilshan, no run fuller length delivery on the middle, the batsman drives it straight to the deepish mid on fielder
Marsh to Dilshan, 1 run he goes full this time, but the direction is all wrong. it's on the pads and it's flicked to fine leg with ease
Marsh to Thirimanne, no run full delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it straight to cover
Marsh to Thirimanne, 1 run full and wide outside off, the batsman stretches and guides it to third man for a single
Marsh to Dilshan, no run fullish delivery on the off stump, the batsman comes forward and drives it to mid-on
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman works it to backward square leg with the turn
Doherty to Dilshan, no run beautiful delivery, tossed up and it spun a bit to beat the batsman's intended drive
Doherty to Dilshan, no run now he fires this one on the pads. Dilshan is unlucky to miss this sweep
Doherty to Dilshan, no run flatter and quicker on off, the batsman comes forward and drives it back to the bowler
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run tossed up, slower and on a length, the batsman waits and then pushes it to the left of cover for a quick single
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run pushes it through on off, the batsman dabs it to cover for a single
Marsh to Thirimanne, FOUR runs fuller length delivery wide outside off, the batsman goes for a forceful drive but gets a thick outside edge. There is no slip and it runs to the boundary
Marsh to Thirimanne, 2 runs similar delivery, but this time he drives it on the up through extra cover beautifully for a couple
Marsh to Thirimanne, no run slower delivery this time, it's full and on off stump line, the batsman pushes it to mid-off
Marsh to Thirimanne, no run back of length delivery outside off, the batsman defends it towards point
Marsh to Thirimanne, FOUR runs he comes down the pitch this time and makes room as well, drives the length delivery over the cover fielder and finds the boundary easily.
Marsh to Thirimanne, no run he comes forward and drives this fuller delivery down to mid-off
Doherty to Dilshan, no run nicely bowled again! Tossed up and slower outside off, Dilshan is beaten as he tries to wristily push it through off
Doherty to Dilshan, 1 run pushed through on the pads, the batsman turns it to square leg for a single
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run he takes a couple of steps forward, but the ball is fired full outside off, it's dug out towards mid off
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run slower and on off stump line, defended off the back foot
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run he fires this flat outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to deep cover
Doherty to Dilshan, no run tossed up and slower, it drifts in to the batsman, who drives it back to the bowler
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run tossed up and slow outside off, the batsman defends it to off
Maxwell to Dilshan, 1 run he comes forward and pushes it towards cover with soft hands and calls for a quick single
Maxwell to Thirimanne, no run he comes down the pitch and drives the flighted delivery, but straight to mid-on
Maxwell to Thirimanne, no run he placed it towards midwicket, but Maxwell ran to the ball quickly and fired a throw towards non-striker's because Dilshan had run a few paces down.. No damage done
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run
Maxwell to Dilshan, no run tossed up delivery on the middle and leg line, driven straight to midwicket
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run he comes down the track and drives it to long on for an easy single

Doherty to Dilshan, OUT caught at slip! What a catch by Watson, diving to his right, he picked this one low and one-handed! Doherty has been bowling well to Dilshan, he floats this one on the middle and leg line and gets it to turn just a touch, enough to beat batsman's whippy drive to the on side. Dilshan got a leading edge and Watson did the rest completing an excellent catch
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run fired in flat on the middle stump line, the batsman defends it off the front foot
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up and slower this time, the batsman defends it down the pitch
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run flat and full on off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to cover
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and pushes it back to the bowler
Maxwell to Thirimanne, no run comes down the pitch and pushes the flighted delivery to midwicket
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run flatter delivery, the batsman pushes it to the gap at cover point for a single
Maxwell to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up delivery on the middle stump line, the batsman defends it off the front foot
Maxwell to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run he comes forward and gets and inside edge past that leg slip fielder for a single
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run tossed up on off stump line, the batsman pushes it to deep cover for a single
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run flatter delivery on off stump line, the batsman waits and dabs it to the gap at cover for a quick single
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run quicker delivery on the stumps, Mahela comes forward and defends
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs he makes room and stylishly chips it over the cover fielder for a couple
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run flatter and shorter on off, the batsman opens the face to place it to backward point
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run flatter delivery on the pads, the batsman nudges it towards square leg for a single
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run almost a return catch! The bowler shortened the length as he saw the batsman advancing and Thiri punched it almost all the way to Doherty.
Maxwell to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and works it past midwicket for a single
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 2 runs oh he is lucky here! He tried a similar inside out shout as Mahela's in the last over, but he got too much height on it..Lucky for him it landed wide of long off
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run he nudges this one to backward square leg for a single
Maxwell to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run he pushes it softly to square leg for a quick single, but a direct hit from the fielder at midwicket would have made that interesting
Maxwell to Thirimanne, no run he comes forward and defends it to off
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run fuller length, allows the batsman to drive it to deep cover
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run he brings up his fifty with a front-foot nudge to deep point
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run flatter delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it point
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run he waits on the back foot and defends it to midwicket
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 3 runs shorter this time, Mahela is not the one to miss out on these, he waits and opens the face of the bat to run it through gully
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run he comes down the pitch and pushes it to mid-on for a single
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up delivery on the middle, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run he dabs it to square leg for an easy single
Maxwell to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run reverse sweep from Mahela that almost looked like heading to the boundary, but McKay dives at short third man to prevent the boundary
Maxwell to Thirimanne, no run he comes down the pitch and defends as the length is on the shorter side
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run quicker delivery on off, the batsman goes back and punches it through point for a single
Maxwell to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and drives it back to the bowler
Maxwell to Mahela Jayawardene, no run he comes down the pitch, but Big Show adjusts his length to a shorter one. Mahela defends it to midwicket
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run comes out of the crease to smash it over the sight screen, but he gets an inside edge as the ball turns in to him
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 leg bye flatter and shorter, but it spins in to the batsman, hits the thigh pads and rolls towards short third man
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pushed through on the off stump line, defended back to the bowler
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run slower and shorter, but on the off stump line, the batsman takes a forward stride and defends
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run still slower, this time outside off though, the batsman chops it to backward point
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run pushed through on the stumps, the batsman defends it to the leg side
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run quicker and on a length outside off, the batsman pushes it past point for a single
Maxwell to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs it's fired on the leg stump, but Mahela is quick to latch on to that, he goes down on his knee and powerfully paddles it past that leg slip fielder
Maxwell to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs a reverse-sweep this time, McKay can watch it go past him this time as this one was few meters away from him this time
Maxwell to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run slower and on off stump this time, the batsman dabs it to the right of midwicket for a quick single
Maxwell to Thirimanne, 1 run he comes down the track and pushes the tossed up delivery to long off
Maxwell to Mahela Jayawardene, no run tossed up and full outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to midwicket
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run flatter and turning in from outside off, the batsman pushes it to the gap at cover off the back foot
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run another inside-out chip shot from Mahela, precise, very precise. It's over the cover fielder, but short of dep extra cover
Doherty to Thirimanne, no run he comes down the pitch and inside edges the intended drive on to his pads
Doherty to Thirimanne, 1 run this time he gets a single with a push to long on
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run shorter and flatter on off, the batsman waits and pushes it to point
Doherty to Mahela Jayawardene, no run fuller and quicker on off stump, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run here comes the yorker first up! Aimed at the toes, but Thiri does well to block it out
Johnson to Thirimanne, no run another one aimed at the toes, Thiri jams it out to mid-on this time

Johnson to Thirimanne, OUT short delivery outside off and he has pulled it straight to the fielder at midwicket. He was done in by the pace, 143 kph on that one, and was not in control of that shot. Also, that didn't bounce as high as anyone would have expected it to, Thiri took it just below chest high. A big breakthrough although
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run another short delivery, but this one is down the leg side and Angelo pulls it fine on the leg side for a single
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs back of length delivery outside off, Mahela just bends those knees and creams it through point.. No chance for anyone..
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run nasty short delivery from round the wicket, hits the batsman on his wrists as he tries to whip it to the leg side.. Serious pace there
McKay to Angelo Mathews, no run bowls a back of length delivery outside off, with a grunt, the batsman defends it from the crease
McKay to Angelo Mathews, no run another back of length delivery just outside off, the batsman defends it off the back foot this time
McKay to Angelo Mathews, no run he comes down the pitch and defends the back of length delivery to cover
McKay to Angelo Mathews, no run he comes forward and drives the length delivery on the up, but straight to mid off
McKay to Angelo Mathews, no run back of length delivery on off, the batsman goes back and defends it solidly
McKay to Angelo Mathews, 2 runs it's through the midwicket fielder, Watson there! It was a fuller delivery and the batsman flicked it powerfully for a couple of runs to the deep
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run fires a short of length delivery that hurries on to the batsman as he tries to pull it, it was in the air for a while, but well short of the man at fine leg
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run Angelo gives him the charge, drives it, but straight to the man at mid off

Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 leg bye back of length delivery of off, the batsman tries to whip it to the leg side but gets hit high on the pads. It rolls towards backward point, from where the fielder fires in a throw at non-striker's. Could have surprised the batsman had he hit
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run fuller length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to cover
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run falls just short of Watson this time! It was a full delivery angling in and the batsman flicked it in the air, just drops short of Watson..
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run back of length this time, 145 kph, the batsman tries to defend it off the back foot and gets an inside edge towards square leg
Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, no run short of length ball just outside off, dabbed towards short third man, no run
Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run length ball on off stump, clipped in front of square leg for a single
Faulkner to Angelo Mathews, no run just outside off, defended towards point by Mathews
Faulkner to Angelo Mathews, 1 run strays on to the pads, helped towards short fine leg for a single
Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run another quick single is taken, just drops the ball towards point and sets off
Faulkner to Angelo Mathews, 1 run full ball on middle, driven towards midwicket for the fourth single of the over
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, no run quick ball from wide of the stumps, angling in towards the batsman, who defends to the leg side

Johnson to Angelo Mathews, FOUR runs shot! superb hit from Mathews, that was shortish from Johnson, Mathews backs to make room and unleashes a ferocious slap that send the ball racing to the cover boundary
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, 1 run tapped towards point for a single this time

Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, no run Jayaewardene struggling with the wide angle from which Johnson is delivering, a somewhat round-arm action from round the wicket, Jayawardene jumps awkwardly as he defends that shortish ball from the crease
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run similar length and outside off, dabbed towards point where Maxwell fields
Johnson to Angelo Mathews, (no ball) 1 run a beamer! Johnson fires in a high full toss, 146.4kph, above waist height, guided down to third man for a single
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run short of length ball just outside off, played with soft hands towards point for a single
Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run he bowls it full and he bowls it wide outside off, it's slower too, the batsman drives it to deep extra cover for a single
Faulkner to Angelo Mathews, (no ball) 1 run this one is full-toss too and has been called a no-ball, but because he had overstepped. the batsman flicked it deep midwicket
Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs he bowls a low full toss and Mahela easily paddles it fine to the boundary on the leg side
Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run he comes forward and pushes the length delivery to deep cover for a single
Faulkner to Angelo Mathews, no run slower delivery outside off, the batsman tries to push it to cover, but is beaten
Faulkner to Angelo Mathews, no run bows a good yorker on off stump, the batsman digs it out. Hits it back to the bowler

Faulkner to Angelo Mathews, OUT That is bowled! For a few seconds no one had any idea about what was going on! It was a full length delivery and the batsman tried to whip it to the leg side, but it flicked the off stump on its way. The bowler was busy appealing for something (maybe a caught behind as there was a sound).. But it took a while for everyone to realise that the bails were off
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 wide he attempts a yorker, but this one is down the leg side
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run length delivery outside off, the batsman defends it solidly back to the bowler
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run slower delivery on a fuller length outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run length delivery on off, the batsman whips it through midwicket
McKay to Chandimal, no run fuller length delivery on off stump, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
McKay to Chandimal, 1 run length delivery outside off, the batsman drives it on the up to deep cover for a single

McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs he keeps doing this with such ease! It was a length delivery and all Mahela does it chips it with some timing over the cover fielder. No power, just timing. It easily beats the man at deep extra cover
Johnson to Chandimal, 2 runs he bowls a full delivery and Chandimal throws his bat at that targeting that region over extra cover, but doesn't get the timing luckily as it falls short of long off

Johnson to Chandimal, OUT caught at mid-on. Tries the big whack again, but it was a slower delivery and although it looked like he had made good connection, he hadn't. That went just high and not long at all. Easily gobbled
Johnson to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run he waits on the back foot and guides the length delivery down to third man for a single
Johnson to Kulasekara, 2 runs he gets a low full toss outside off and pushes it to deep cover for a single
Johnson to Kulasekara, 2 runs back of length delivery outside off, the batsman chops it down to third man for a couple
Johnson to Kulasekara, no run he bowls a short delivery, but the batsman ducks under it and the ball goes down the leg side.. Surprisingly not called a wide
Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run he bowls a high full-toss and Mahela who was crouching a bit for one of his dab shots, does well to swivel and pull it to deep square leg
Faulkner to Kulasekara, 1 run bowls a good yorker on leg stump, but Kula jabs it down to fine leg off the toe of his bat
Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run he makes room and drives the ball silkily to deep extra cover
Faulkner to Kulasekara, 1 wide attempts another leg-stump yorker, but this one is just a little too far down the leg side

Faulkner to Kulasekara, 1 run, OUT bowls a slower ball outside off, the batsman tries to pull it down the ground but doesn't get hold of it. It falls around mid-on and the batsmen try to steal a second, but a quick throw from the deep catches Kula well short of his crease
Faulkner to Herath, no run he bowls a dot-ball at this stage, beats Herath's attempted cut outside off
Faulkner to Herath, 1 run length delivery outside off, Herath makes room and cracks it to deep point
Faulkner to Chandimal, 1 run he bowls a length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to mid-off and takes off for a single. Another attempt from the fielder, but yet again, it misses the stumps
Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run slower delivery on a length outside off, the batsman dabs it to cover for a single
Faulkner to Chandimal, 1 run it's a slower delivery on a fuller length outside off, the batsman drives it to deep extra cover for a single
Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run the batsman comes forward and drives the length ball to wide mid-off for a single
Faulkner to Chandimal, 1 run finally there is a direct hit (by the bowler at striker's end), and that too when the batsmen weren't attempting a run. The ricochet allows an overthrow
Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs he bowls it full and wide this time and the batsman creams it through cover point, the shot beats the man at deep cover
McKay to Chandimal, no run he bowls it slightly slower outside off, the batsman tries to run it down to third man but is beaten
McKay to Chandimal, no run back of length delivery on off, Chandimal dabs it to point, but decides against the single as he sees the fielder charging towards it
McKay to Chandimal, 1 run he goes fuller this time, the batsman punches it past the non-striker for a single
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run length delivery angling in towards the middle stump, the batsman whips it past midwicket for a single
McKay to Chandimal, 1 run length delivery on the middle, the batsman pushes it towards mid on for a single
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, no run he bowls it full and on the off stump line, the batsman pushes it straight to midwicket
McKay to Herath, 1 wide he bowls a short of length delivery, but this is very wide down the leg side
McKay to Herath, 1 run another aerial shot falls well short of the fielder in deep, this one was cut in the air towards third-man
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run slower length delivery on the middle, the batsman slaps it down to fine leg for a single
McKay to Herath, no run quick short delivery to Herath and this one sails past head high
McKay to Herath, 1 bye another short ball, Herath swings his bat but makes no connection. They steal a bye though
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs he moves to the leg side and just places it in the tiny gap between short third man and backward point. How does he do that?
McKay to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run moves to the leg side again, and then dabs the slower delivery to backward point for a single

Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, OUT Mahela makes room and drives it inside out, but this is straight to the man at extra cover. Mahela was not interested in the single, but Herath runs all the way down to the striker's end.. Simple run out, but doesn't really matter at this stage. Mahela is still on strike
Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, FOUR runs he comes down the pitch and takes the attempted yorker on the full, whacks it over extra cover for yet another boundary in that region
Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, 2 runs slower delivery from the back of his hand, Mahela comes down the pitch and slaps it to deep cover for a quick couple
Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, no run he goes for a reverse sweep this time, but this one was a quick one aimed at leg stump, he makes no connection this time and gets hit on the pads

Faulkner to Mahela Jayawardene, 1 run low full toss, the batsman drives it hard, but this time he is not able to find that gap at extra cover.. It's straight to the fielder. They think about a second, but finally settle down for a single

Faulkner to Malinga, 2 runs he gets some bat on it and pushes it to midwicket. It was a single till the bowler ran to field that, but a wild throw towards the keeper allows the Sri Lankans to get back for a second

A masterclass from Mahela has given Sri Lanka a strong total again. They didn't have the best of the starts when they lost an in-form Sanga early, but the young guns finally arrived and played their part in setting up a good total. Tough shot for Australia, but you never know in cricket. It's not impossible.
If Australia win this after 29.1 overs, New Zealand are through.
If Australia win this in 29.1 overs, they are through to the next round.
If Sri Lanka restrict Aus to 164, they will top the table.
If Sri Lanka win this, they are through to the next round.
Scenarios again:
Fireworks expected. Watson's going to be the key batsman.
5.10pm 254 in 29.1 overs? Anyone think it is possible against Malinga & Co? Shane Watson is walking out, with Phillip Hughes as his partner. Shaminda Eranga to bowl.
Eranga to Watson, FOUR runs what a start! Watson begins with a sensational drive through the covers for four, that was a length ball outside off, Watson leans into it and puts that away
Eranga to Watson, no run shorter this time, closer to off stump, Watson waits in the crease and looks to dab the ball down to third man, beaten
Eranga to Watson, no run bit of width, 134kph, shortish ball, slapped firmly towards point but well stopped by Dilshan
Eranga to Watson, no run length ball is defended back down the track
Eranga to Watson, 1 run length ball outside off, punched solidly back towards the bowler, bounces over the bowler's head, Eranga gets a hand on it but can only deflect it towards mid-off for a single
Eranga to Hughes, FOUR runs Hughes nearly bowled first ball, that wasn't too far outside off but he still goes for the cut, bottom edges it past the stumps for a streaky boundary
Kulasekara to Watson, no run back of a length ball outside off, defended towards cover by Watson

Kulasekara to Watson, OUT Kula has done it, last match it was with the bat, this time he has removed the dangerman Shane Watson with the ball, the ball angles in towards the stumps, Watson looks to dab it behind point, no footwork from Watson, he misses and the stumps are disturbed, the Sri Lankan fans at The Oval scream to make it known how big a moment this is
Kulasekara to Maxwell, 1 wide way down the leg side
Kulasekara to Maxwell, 1 run pushed towards cover for a single, the much-hyped Maxwell is off the mark
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run short of length ball on off stump, Hughes gets behind the line and defends
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run pegged back in the crease, looking to work the ball to the leg side, edges it towards cover
Kulasekara to Hughes, no run length ball just outside off, a good-looking drive towards short cover
Eranga to Maxwell, no run back of a length ball from Eranga, 137kph, just outside off, Maxwell fishes for it outside off and is beaten
Eranga to Maxwell, 2 runs full and on the pads, lofted over mid-on and there's a long chase for Malinga, only two runs result though, should have pushed for three there
Eranga to Maxwell, no run Eranga gets the ball to sway away a touch outside off, Maxwell hangs his bat outside off and is beaten once more
Eranga to Maxwell, 1 leg bye length ball on the pads, huge appeal for lbw but that looked to be sliding down leg, the ball dribbles in front of square leg
Eranga to Hughes, no run length ball outside off, Hughes goes for his favourite cut, and he is late on it, mistimes it to the off side
Eranga to Hughes, no run a touch shorter and on leg stump, Hughes looks ungainly as he blocks that to the leg side
Kulasekara to Maxwell, no run great line just outside off, Maxwell pokes at it and is beaten once more
Kulasekara to Maxwell, FOUR runs the Big Show gets going with a lofted drive over extra cover, it was a full ball and that is launched for a boundary

Kulasekara to Maxwell, SIX runs beautiful shot from Maxwell, a length ball and Maxwell takes a pace out of the crease and lifts that over the bowler's head, minimal effort, lovely swing of the bat, and the ball sails over the rope towards the sightscreen
Kulasekara to Maxwell, 4 leg byes terrific come back from Kulasekara, Maxwell was backing away, Kula follows him and that ricochets of his body, between the keeper and slip for four leg byes
Kulasekara to Maxwell, no run slants this in towards the pads, strikes the pads as well, an lbw appeal but that was sliding down
Kulasekara to Maxwell, no run shorter from Kulasekara, Maxwell skates down the track and tries to hammer the ball down the track, can't get it past the bowler

Eranga to Hughes, FOUR runs someone tell Hughes where the middle of the bat is, all edges here, this time a French cut for four, he was looking to drive that through the covers, that ball was well outside off, ends up as four runs for Australia
Eranga to Hughes, 1 run dabbed behind point for a single
Eranga to Maxwell, no run short of length ball outside off, Maxwell slaps it back towards the bowler
Eranga to Maxwell, FOUR runs thrashes that through cover, how hard was that hit? Maxwell skips down the track and lashes that short of length ball through the off side for four
Eranga to Maxwell, FOUR runs full ball heading for the leg stump, Maxwell gets his front leg out of the way and drills that wide of mid-on for four, Maxwell gallops to 21
Eranga to Maxwell, no run shortish ball just outside off, Maxwell wants to club that over midwicket but he can't connect
Kulasekara to Hughes, FOUR runs Hughes finally connects properly with the cut, gets well forward and chops that past point for four more
Kulasekara to Bailey, 1 run short of length ball outside off, Bailey gets off the mark by guiding that down to third man for a single, showing Hughes how it is done

Kulasekara to Maxwell, FOUR runs Maxwell throwing his bat at everything, short ball just outside off, a powerful pull in front of square leg for four, the man in the deep puts in a dive but that was too quick for him
Kulasekara to Maxwell, 1 wide slides down the leg side, a free run for Australia
Kulasekara to Maxwell, 1 run full ball just outside off, squeezed out towards extra cover for a single
Kulasekara to Bailey, no run slanting in towards off stump, defended towards mid-on
Malinga to Maxwell, 1 wide starts off with a slower-ball yorker, but he misses his direction, it's down the leg side
Malinga to Maxwell, 2 runs he makes room and tries to slam it over long-on, but hits it high, really high and it comes down in the vacant region at wide long on
Malinga to Maxwell, FOUR runs slower delivery on a length and what does big show do? He slams it down the ground. Mid-off had no chance
Malinga to Voges, 1 wide he attempts a slower yorker again, but this one is wide down the leg side..
Malinga to Voges, 1 run tests the batsman with a short one, who does well to hop on the crease and tuck it to square leg
Malinga to Bailey, 1 run back of length delivery, but this one is on the pads and Voges picks up his first runs to fine leg
Malinga to Voges, no run he bowls another full slower delivery, the batsman watches it carefully and defends it down the ground
Kulasekara to Bailey, 1 run he makes room and pushes the length delivery to wide mid-off for a quick single
Kulasekara to Voges, no run the batsman is squared up by a length delivery on off, he pushes this one to cover point
Kulasekara to Voges, no run this one comes in from a short of length, the batsman defends it towards the leg side off the back foot
Kulasekara to Voges, 1 run back of length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it towards covers and they take a quick single
Kulasekara to Bailey, 1 run a misfield by Rangana at mid-on allows a single. It was hit straight to him, a bit hard though, but those ones should be stopped
Kulasekara to Voges, 1 run he angles this one in to the batsman who tucks it to deep square leg for a single
Malinga to Voges, 1 run he bowls a length ball, the batsman stays in the crease and pushes it in the gap at cover for a single
Malinga to Bailey, 2 leg byes loud appeal for lbw, but that was a ridiculous appeal! That full-toss was clearly heading down the leg side. The batsman was beaten by the lack of pace on that though
Malinga to Voges, no run a 123 kph yorker to the new man, who just gets his bat down in time
Malinga to Voges, no run full delivery on the middle and leg line, the batsman defends it down the pitch
Malinga to Voges, 1 run low full-toss on the pads, the batsman flicks it wide mid-on and another throw comes in.. Safe this time though
Kulasekara to Voges, no run he keeps it tight around the channel, Voges pushes it to point off the front foot
Kulasekara to Voges, 1 run he bowls a back-of-the-hand slower ball on a length, the batsman tucks it to deep midwicket for a single
Kulasekara to Marsh, no run bowls a length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it down the pitch
Kulasekara to Marsh, no run he comes forward and defends the length delivery to point
Kulasekara to Marsh, no run and again, he defends it to point form the crease
Kulasekara to Marsh, no run there is an appeal from Sanga for caught behind, but no one else was interested. It was a length delivery outside off and the batsman played inside the line
Malinga to Voges, 1 wide a diving Sangakkara saves Malinga of some embarrassment. This was way down the leg side
Malinga to Voges, no run he stays in the crease and defends the back of length delivery to cover
Malinga to Voges, 1 run he gets a yorker this time and does well to flick it to deep midwicket
Malinga to Marsh, no run he gets up on his toes and defends the back of length delivery to the off side
Malinga to Marsh, no run he bowls a yorker again, this time it's wide outside off, Marsh blocks it out to the off side
Malinga to Marsh, 1 run he comes forward and slices the low full toss to deep cover
Malinga to Voges, (no ball) another one of those slow thigh-high full-tosses, this one is down the leg side
Malinga to Voges, no run he waits in the crease and chops the length delivery to point
Herath to Marsh, no run
Herath to Marsh, no run slow and very slow on off, the batsman defends it off the front foot
Herath to Marsh, 1 run he stays on the back foot and pushes the length ball to off for a single
Herath to Voges, no run waits on the back foot and defends it back down the pitch
Herath to Voges, 1 run he comes down the pitch and drives the tossed up delivery to long on
Herath to Marsh, 1 run flatter and slow heading towards middle, the batsman goes back and punches it to deep cover
Angelo Mathews to Marsh, no run he bowls a length ball on off, the batsman pushes it to point off the front foot
Angelo Mathews to Marsh, 1 run he walks down the pitch and punches the short of length delivery in the air towards wide mid-off, Malinga there does well
Angelo Mathews to Voges, no run he pushes the length ball towards deep cover for a single
Angelo Mathews to Voges, no run slower offcutter on off stump, the batsman slaps it straight to midwicket
Angelo Mathews to Voges, 1 run a direct hit from midwicket there would have had the batsman! Even the dive wouldn't have saved him.. But the fielder missed it
Herath to Voges, no run slow length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
Herath to Voges, 1 run tossed up, but on a length, the batsman goes on the back foot and tucks it to square leg for a single

Herath to Wade, 2 leg byes loud loud appeal from Sanga as the batsman gets hit on the pads with a turning ball. Herath went over the wicket to the left-hander and got the ball to turn in from outside off. the batsman tried to tickle it to the leg side, but got hit on the pads. Sri Lanka call for a review, but that one just hit the batsman outside the line.. That would have hit the leg stump though
Herath to Wade, no run he comes down the pitch to a tossed up delivery wide outside off, defends to off
Herath to Wade, 1 run he comes forward and works it away to square leg for a single
Herath to Voges, no run quicker delivery on the off stump, the batsman defends it to the leg side off the back foot
Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run he bowls a slower delivery on a length outside off, the batsman comes forward and defends to off
Angelo Mathews to Wade, FOUR runs cracking shot by Wade! He jumped out on this slower delivery, made room as he did so, and timed it through point
Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run another slower delivery that hits the pad as the batsman misses his flick, Angelo appeals, but that pitched outside leg
Angelo Mathews to Wade, FOUR runs he comes down the pitch again and manages to drag the short of length delivery through backward square leg for a boundary. Not in full control of that shot
Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run slower delivery on the middle stump line, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
Angelo Mathews to Wade, no run he tries to whack this through off side, but is beaten by the slowness of that ball
Herath to Voges, no run he bowls the arm-ball, the batsman makes room and cuts it hard, but finds the fielder at point
Herath to Voges, 1 run this time he comes out of the crease and drives the full delivery hard down the ground to long on
Herath to Wade, no run now Wade comes out of the crease but is not to the pitch of the ball, defends it back to the bowler
Herath to Wade, 1 run tossed up outside off, the batsman sweeps it from there and drags it to deep square leg
Herath to Voges, 1 run tries to toss it up, but the batsman comes down the crease and takes it on the full, drives it hard straight down the ground, but Dilshan at long on cuts it off
Herath to Wade, SIX runs this one is massive massive hit! it was tossed up outside off and the batsman jumped out of the crease to launch it way way over the sight screen
Malinga to Voges, 1 run bowls a slower length ball on off, the batsman pushes it to deep point for a single
Malinga to Wade, 1 run he walks across the stumps but gets a yorker wide outside off, the batsman blocks it out towards off and takes a single
Malinga to Voges, 1 run short of length delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to deep cover off the back foot
Malinga to Wade, no run now fires in on Wade's boots, the batsman gets his foot out of the way and blocks it back to the bowler
Malinga to Wade, FOUR runs oh beautifully smacked over midwicket! It was a short delivery on the body and Wade was quick to swivel and pull it hard over the infield
Malinga to Wade, 1 run fired on to the pads, but the batsman digs it out towards long on for a single

Kulasekara to Wade, FOUR runs length delivery wide outside off and Wade smashes it over extra cover, but this is a big outfield. It teases the man from deep extra cover, who dives, but is not able to save that boundary
Kulasekara to Wade, 2 runs that was a stinger! Angelo at extra cover gets hands to it diving full length to his left, but that was hit very hard and it is not fair to put that as a drop

Kulasekara to Wade, 1 run he tries to whack this length ball, but inside edges back down the pitch. The non-striker wants a single and runs through, Wade starts belatedly and runs along with the ball and there is a mid-pitch collision between Kula and Wade...Kula goes down, Wade makes it to the other end. Kula looks at the umpire, but I think Wade was running in a straight line
Kulasekara to Voges, no run back of the hand slower ball, Voges comes forward and defends it towards midwicket
Kulasekara to Voges, 1 run length delivery on off, the batsman slaps it down to long on for a single
Kulasekara to Wade, no run he comes down the pitch but Kula bowls it full and wide outside off and beats the bat
Malinga to Voges, 3 runs there comes the slower ball yorker again, but Voges does well to drive it past midwicket for three down to cow corner
Malinga to Wade, 1 run this time it's the pacy yorker, Wade just pushes it to extra cover for a single
Malinga to Voges, 2 runs slower delivery on a length outside off, the batsman drives it to deep extra cover for a couple
Malinga to Voges, 1 run he bowls it full and on the pads, the batsman drives that easily down to long on for a single
Malinga to Wade, 1 run he takes a step down the pitch and tucks the length delivery to square leg for a single
Malinga to Voges, 2 runs here comes another yorker and Voges digs it out to deep backward square leg for another couple

Kulasekara to Wade, OUT caught at long-off! Wade falls after a brief counter-attacking innings and it sets off the Sri Lankan fielders into wild celebrations. It was a length delivery wide outside off and Wade tried to whack it straight down the ground but got a thick leading edge that ballooned over the infield, but Dilshan at long-off was waiting for it
Kulasekara to Voges, 1 run length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to mid-off for a single
Kulasekara to Faulkner, no run fuller length delivery on off, the batsman defends it solidly off the front foot
Kulasekara to Faulkner, no run he bowls a bouncer this time, quite pacy as well, Faulkner sways out of line just in time
Kulasekara to Faulkner, 1 run now he follows it up with a slower delivery, the batsman dabs it towards gully for a single
Kulasekara to Voges, 1 run now he bowls a yorker which the batsman digs out to long on for a single
Malinga to Voges, 1 run slower length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman steers it down to third man

Malinga to Faulkner, no run that is a good bouncer, right in front of the batsman's face. Faulkner does well to drop it down right in front of him, although he didn't know where it was for a brief moment
Malinga to Faulkner, 1 run another short ball, this time the batsman dabs it to gully for a single
Malinga to Voges, no run he bowls a slower delivery with a lot of under-spin, the batsman flat-bats it back to the bowler
Malinga to Voges, no run good yorker, somehow it misses the off stump! The batsman was making room to carve it through covers, but was beaten by the lack of pace on it
Malinga to Voges, 5 wide that is a wild wild delivery! Sanga did his best, but that was still too wide. Five wides down the leg side
Malinga to Voges, 1 run fires in a yorker on the middle stump, the batsman digs it out to mid-off for a single
Herath to Voges, 2 runs the batsman comes down the pitch and takes the flighted delivery on the full, but gets a toe end as he drives it over the bowler's head

Herath to Voges, 1 leg bye that was the left-hander's carrom ball and the batsman somehow managed to get a bat on it, he chopped it towards gully, but there was a direct hit at the non-striker's end. The umpire checks with the third umpire, but the batsman made it in time
Herath to Faulkner, FOUR runs he sweeps it, and sweeps it fine in the gap at deep backward square leg. It was finer than where he was intending to hit that, but a good result for him
Herath to Faulkner, 1 run full delivery on the leg stump line, the batsman crisply times it past the non-striker
Herath to Voges, no run he comes down the pitch, but Herath fires it down the leg side. The batsman does well to pad it away
Herath to Voges, 1 run full delivery, it is tucked to square leg for a quick single
Angelo Mathews to Voges, 1 run he bowls a slower delivery, the batsman comes down the pitch and pushes it to long off for a single
Angelo Mathews to Faulkner, no run another slower delivery, this one is almost like a spinner's flighted one, it beats the bat as the batsman plays inside the line
Angelo Mathews to Faulkner, FOUR runs another slower ball, but this time Faulkner created his own pace by jumping down the pitch and crashing that through extra cover for a boundary
Angelo Mathews to Faulkner, FOUR runs here comes the ramp shot! It didn't have too much pace on it as it was a slower ball, but it was right in the gap between the keeper and short fine leg fielder
Angelo Mathews to Faulkner, 1 run length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to cover for a single
Angelo Mathews to Voges, 1 run another slower delivery, the batsman pushes it through cover for a single

Herath to Voges, 2 runs that looked like he was out the moment the ball hit the bat! Huge leading edge that went towards covers, but the fielder there was close in and he had to run backwards to get to that. In the end, he just got a hand to it
Herath to Voges, 1 leg bye he comes down the pitch, but Herath fires it on the pads. Voges manages to get some pad on it as had he missed it, he would have been a stumping candidate
Herath to Faulkner, no run full delivery on the leg stump, the batsman drives it to midwicket where the fielder makes a good stop
Herath to Faulkner, 1 run he swipes across the line to play that to deep midwicket
Herath to Voges, 1 run flat and quick on leg stump , the batsman drives it hard to deep midwicket
Eranga to Voges, no run he bowls a quick length delivery on off, the batsman dabs it straight to point
Eranga to Voges, 1 run back of length delivery on the middle, the batsman chops it to gully and steals a quick single
Eranga to Johnson, no run that was quick and menacing outside off! The batsman is beaten as he plays inside the line
Eranga to Johnson, no run he tries to pull this short of length delivery, but plays it without any timing to mid on
Eranga to Johnson, FOUR runs length delivery wide outside off and the batsman drives it on the up straight down the ground for a boundary
Herath to McKay, no run pushed through on the middle stump, the batsman defends it off the back foot
Herath to McKay, 1 wide pushes it down the leg side, called a wide
Herath to McKay, no run flatter delivery on the middle and leg line, more back foot defence
Herath to McKay, no run slower this time, on the pads, the batsman is unable to get any bat on that and gets hit on the pads
Herath to McKay, no run slower again, the batsman pushes it to midwicket off the back foot
Herath to McKay, no run more slowness from Herath, defended off the back foot
Herath to McKay, no run now he fires it full on off stump, the batsman takes a forward step and drives it to cover
Eranga to Voges, 1 run length delivery, the batsman makes room and drives it through off, but the fielder at cover makes a diving stop
Eranga to McKay, no run full and honing in on off stump, the batsman drives it back to the bowler
Eranga to McKay, 1 wide short of length delivery, but this one slides down the leg side
Eranga to McKay, no run slower offcutter outside off, the batsman dabs it to point and leaves the crease. Dilshan from point fires it at the non-striker's end, hits the stumps, but Voges is just in
Eranga to McKay, no run he almost drives it back to the bowler! He bowled it slightly slower and it hit the bat a little high as the batsman came forward to push it
Eranga to McKay, 1 run he comes forward and drives the length ball on the up to deep cover
Eranga to Voges, no run makes room, but he is not able to do much as it's an excellent yorker on the leg stump. He is only able to push it back to the bowler
Herath to McKay, 1 run flatter delivery on the pads, the batsman punches it to deep midwicket for a single
Herath to Voges, 1 wide fired down the leg side, it's very wide
Herath to Voges, 2 wide another slider and it's down the leg side again. The keeper is not able to take it cleanly, and the batsman steal's an extra
Herath to McKay, 1 run tossed up delivery on the pads, the batsman tucks it to square leg for a single
Herath to Voges, 1 run full and flighted on the middle, the batsman comes forward and drives it down to long off
Herath to McKay, no run he goes back to a length ball, and gets hit on the pads, but that was heading down the leg side
Herath to McKay, 1 run he comes forward and pushes the full delivery towards mid on for a single
Herath to Voges, 1 run he comes forwards and dabs it to square leg for a single
Eranga to Voges, FOUR runs short ball that follows the batsman as he makes room, but Voges slaps it to deep square leg boundary with ease
Eranga to Voges, 1 run full delivery on off stump, the batsman drives it down the ground to long on for a single
Eranga to McKay, no run he bowls a short delivery, but this one is outside off and the batsman easily ducks under it
Eranga to McKay, no run another short delivery, this time it is better directed and beats the bat as the batsman misses his pull
Eranga to McKay, no run length delivery on off, the batsman drives it on the up, but straight to cover
Eranga to McKay, no run he bowls a yorker which the batsman drives it back to him
Malinga to Voges, FOUR runs goes for a yorker, but it is not full enough. Ideal half-volley for the batsman to whack it over midwicket.
Malinga to Voges, 1 run now the batsman gets a leg-stump yorker which he times nicely to deep midwicket for a single
Malinga to McKay, no run he bowls a slower delivery just outside off, hangs in the air before coming down, it beats the batsman
Malinga to McKay, no run another yorker, McKay calmly digs it out back to the bowler
Malinga to McKay, 2 runs bowls a full toss on the pads, McKay calmly tucks it to deep square leg for an easy couple
Malinga to McKay, no run another attempted yorker, but this could have been expensive. McKay flicked that well, but straight to the man at midwicket

Herath to Voges, no run here comes an appeal for stumping! It was tossed up on off, it dipped, then turned past the outside edge. Did the batsman slide his foot out? Yes he did, but looks like he just got it back in time
Herath to Doherty, no run he comes forward to a pushed through delivery, and is lucky to get an inside edge to that
Herath to Doherty, 1 run he goes back and tucks the length delivery to square leg for a single
Herath to McKay, no run he goes back and defends the length delivery down the pitch
Herath to McKay, no run pushed further up, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
Malinga to Doherty, no run bowls a length delivery that is angled across the left-hander, he is beaten as he plays inside the line
Malinga to Doherty, no run another quick length delivery veering away from the batsman, another play and miss
Malinga to Doherty, 1 run length delivery outside off, the batsman steers it to third man for a single
Malinga to McKay, 1 run short of length delivery, the batsman hops and tucks it to behind square on the leg side for a single
Malinga to Doherty, 1 wide tries a yorker on the leg stump, but it's down the leg side
Malinga to Doherty, 1 run bowls a slower delivery on the pads, the batsman nudges it to square leg for a single
Malinga to McKay, 1 run fires a quick length delivery on the pads, Mckay tucks it to square leg off the back foot
Herath to McKay, 1 run tossed up delivery on the middle, the batsman eases it to long off for a single
Herath to Doherty, no run tossed up outside off, the batsman drives it firmly back to the bowler
Herath to Doherty, no run now he takes a forward stride and defends the flighted delivery
Herath to Doherty, no run again, takes a forward step and defends it to the leg side
Herath to Doherty, 1 run he bowls a quicker one on the middle stump line and the batsman does well to tuck it to backward square leg off the back foot
Herath to McKay, no run bowls the slider on off stump, the batsman defends it easily off the back foot
Malinga to Doherty, no run bowls it short, but it's not that quick. Doherty easily gets behind that in defence
Malinga to Doherty, 1 run bowls a good yorker on off stump, but Doherty squeezes it out towards point
Malinga to McKay, no run bowls a sharp bouncer this time, but it's outside off and the batsman safely stays out of the way
Malinga to McKay, no run another short ball outside off, this time McKay sways away from the line
Malinga to McKay, FOUR runs oh that is a shot that would have done a lot of players proud. It was a length delivery and McKay so calmly drives it over mid-off, sheer timing in that one
Malinga to McKay, 1 run menacing yorker aimed at the boot, McKay digs this out to backward square leg with ease too
Herath to McKay, 2 runs he bowls it slow and short, it allows the batsman to go back and punch it past midwicket for a single
Herath to McKay, 1 run another one that is slow and slightly short, the batsman goes back and punches it to long on
Herath to Doherty, 1 run tossed up and full on off, the batsman drives it to long-on for a single
Herath to McKay, 2 runs full and on the leg stump, the batsman tries to drive it to midwicket but gets an inside edge fine on the leg side
Herath to McKay, no run he comes forward and defends the flatter delivery to the off
Herath to McKay, FOUR runs the bowler gives it some air, the batsman gives it more air by smashing it to the cow corner for a one bounce four
Eranga to Doherty, no run he bowls it full outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to mid-off
Eranga to Doherty, no run back of length delivery on off, doesn't bounce that much, the batsman defends it off the back foot
Eranga to Doherty, no run another back of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it solidly to the off side
Eranga to Doherty, no run fuller delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to mid off
Eranga to Doherty, no run bowls a slower yorker on leg stump, the batsman was shuffling across, but digs it out somehow
Eranga to Doherty, no run another length ball, more resolute defence from Doherty
Dilshan to McKay, no run tossed up delivery on off, the batsman pushes it back to the right of the bowler
Dilshan to McKay, no run full and flighted, driven back to the bowler
Dilshan to McKay, 1 run pushed through on the middle stump line, the batsman tucks it to midwicket for a single
Dilshan to Doherty, no run pushed through outside off from round the wicket, Doherty defends
Dilshan to Doherty, 1 run full and flighted on the middle, the batsman eases it to long on for a single
Dilshan to McKay, 2 runs pushed through outside off, the batsman gets an outside edge for a couple..Sanga appeals, Dilshan joins him later... Appeal? Seriously? for an outside edge?
Eranga to Doherty, no run he tries to push the length delivery to off, but chops it very close to the stumps..All safe in the end
Eranga to Doherty, no run back of length delivery on off, Doherty defends it off the back foot
Eranga to Doherty, 1 run bowls a full delivery on the pads, the batsman flicks it in the air towards fine leg for an easy single

Eranga to McKay, 1 run length delivery on off, McKay pushes it softly to mid-off and runs for an easy single. There was a wild throw from Malinga and could have been an overthrow had the midwicket fielder not dived to stop that
Eranga to Doherty, no run short delivery, the batsman gets down on his knees to avoid that as it didn't get too high
Eranga to Doherty, 1 run slower and fuller, he pushes it to mid-off for a single and it could have been tight if the fielder had not fumbled it...
Dilshan to Doherty, no run tossed up full on the leg stump, the batsman digs it out
Dilshan to Doherty, no run now he comes forward and solidly defends it to off
Dilshan to Doherty, no run pushed through on the middle stump line, more solid defence from Doherty
Dilshan to Doherty, 1 run pushed through just outside off, Doherty pushes it in the gap at cover for a single
Dilshan to McKay, 1 run fuller delivery on the pads, it is easily nudged to deep square leg for a single
Dilshan to Doherty, no run there is some turn for Dilshan, but the batsman softly plays it towards short third man
Kulasekara to McKay, no run he bowls it on back of length, McKay defends it easily to the off side
Kulasekara to McKay, no run he bowls a good yorker on off stump, but McKay, without any pressure here, digs it out like a top-order batsman
Kulasekara to McKay, no run length delivery on the pads, the batsman defends it to the leg side this time
Kulasekara to McKay, no run length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
Kulasekara to McKay, 1 wide he bowls a short delivery, bounces well over the batsman and it's another run...
Kulasekara to McKay, no run length delivery outside off, the batsman stays in the crease and punches it to point..
Kulasekara to McKay, no run length delivery on off, McKay wristily drives it to midwicket
Dilshan to Doherty, no run solid forward defence by Doherty, a slip is waiting for a catch
Dilshan to Doherty, 1 run flatter delivery outside off, he waits in the crease and punches it to deep cover for a single
Dilshan to McKay, no run flatter delivery on a length, McKay pushes it to the off side, but no run
Dilshan to McKay, 1 run on the pads, McKay goes back and nudges it to deep square leg for a single

Dilshan to Doherty, 2 runs that was the ball and that broke Doherty's concentration! Tossed up and slow, the batsman went for a booming drive, got an outside edge past slip.. Very lucky.. very very lucky
Dilshan to Doherty, no run now he goes back into the shell again, defends solidly
Kulasekara to McKay, no run length delivery just outside off, defended towards point
Kulasekara to McKay, no run he goes full on off stump, McKay digs it out easily to mid on
Kulasekara to McKay, no run length delivery on off, the batsman takes a forward step and pushes it to cover
Kulasekara to McKay, 1 run he bowls a good slower delivery on the middle stump, but this is again easily dealt with, pushed to long on for a single

Kulasekara to Doherty, 1 run fuller delivery, it is pushed to mid-on and they take off for a single, Thirimanne fires in a throw and hits the stumps direct at non-strikers end but Doherty looked alright.. Slid his bat along..
Kulasekara to McKay, no run length delivery on off, the batsman comes solidly behind it to push it back to the bowler
Dilshan to Doherty, 1 run full and flighted on off, Doherty drives that to long off for a single
Dilshan to McKay, no run he drove it almost back to the bowler! Almost.. just a metre ahead of him.. Dilshan smiles..

Dilshan to McKay, OUT he catches it this time! Absolute blinder by Dilshan to set off wild celebrations on the ground. The crowd has found its voice! It was another flatter delivery, shorter too and the batsman punched it back.. Dilshan was moving to his right, but the ball was hit to his left at a comfortable height, but he quickly changed direction and plucked it out from nowhere, it was drifting awa

Sri Lankan supporters have found their voice after being put to an agonising wait by the last Australian pair. You wonder how crucial those wickets would have been now - Voges, Wade.. all throwing it away. The batting looked easy while the last pair were there. But Sri Lanka did well to hang in there. Kulasekara was amazing at the start of the innings, but there was no doubt the team was feeling the pinch tow

This tournament keeps throwing up super matches and although this one was one-sided for most parts, it did come alive during the last hour. Thanks for your comments and feedback, this is Devashish Fuloria signing off. Ciao ciao.
Sri Lanka won by 20 runs
Player of the match is Mahela Jayawardene, SL
